Mission.title: Our mission
Mission.first-text: Full life and equal opportunities for those who defended our country from the enemy in modern and post-war society
Mission.rehabilitation-text: we will organize access to the best doctors and the latest medical developments
Mission.employment-text: we help you find a job and realize your professional potential
Mission.socialization-text: we contribute to the return of the military to a full-fledged social life

Directions.prosthesis-text: We provide access to the best doctors and the latest medical developments, consultations on prosthetics, help with rehabilitation
Directions.legal-aid-text: Free initial legal assistance on any legal issues
Directions.psychological-help-text: We provide psychological support to help overcome stress after combat experience and adaptation to peaceful life

Team.title: team
Team.join: Do you want to be part of our mission? Join the team today!

Support.text-mobile: If you are inspired by the project, please support our fund.
Support.text-tablet: If the project has inspired you and you would like to support us, please donate any amount that is convenient for you.
